book-scanner.title: LivroScanner (React Native)
book-scanner.description: BookScanner App (React Native) built with React Native, Expo Go and Supabase. The project allows you to scan the barcode of the book and integrates with the Google Books API.

tattoo-shop.title: Tattoo Shop Project - Website with Next.js
tattoo-shop.description: Commercial page for a hypothetical tattoo artist named Sandro Luz. A Next.js project.
